question:
Please list the codes of the schools with a total enrollment of over 500.
Total enrollment can be represented by `Enrollment (K-12)` + `Enrollment (Ages 5-17)`
query: SELECT T2.CDSCode FROM schools AS T1 INNER JOIN frpm AS T2 ON T1.CDSCode = T2.CDSCode WHERE T2."Enrollment (K-12)" + T2."Enrollment (Ages 5-17)" > 500
